mapper.select: SELECT R.*, IFNULL(M.nickname, "삭제된_회원") AS extra__writerName FROM reply AS R LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON R.memberId = M.id WHERE R.id = #{id} AND R.delStatus = 0 ORDER BY R.id DESC

SELECT R.*, IFNULL(M.nickname, "삭제된_회원") AS extra__writerName FROM reply AS R LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON R.memberId = M.id WHERE R.relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode} AND R.relId = #{relId} AND R.delStatus = 0 ORDER BY R.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode}, relId = #{relId}, memberId = #{memberId}, body = #{body}
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET delDate = NOW(), delStatus = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
